answerText: "How Much Land Does a Man Need?"[10] In this novella, the servant Gerasim is the only one to care for the title character after he is injured hanging drapes. The title character screams for three days before expiring, but has a religious epiphany at the end.

question: Question: The protagonist of this short story is offered ownership of all the territory he can encircle in one day by the Chief of the Bashkirs, who turns out to be the Devil.
